name: Ping News
author: omnideveloper

sections.description: The Ping! WordPress plugin allows hyperlocal journalists to submit their news stories to the Ping! system and receive approval/feedback on their stories.
sections.installation: Upload the Ping! plugin to your blog, activate it, then enter your authorization token taken from the Ping! system.
sections.changelog:
1.0.17

Release Date – 31 August 2023

  • Multiple bug fixes

1.0.16

Release Date – 4 August 2023

  • Multiple bug fixes

1.0.15

Release Date – 29 June 2023

  • Multiple bug fixes

1.0.14

Release Date – 15 May 2023

  • Updated Branding

1.0.13

Release Date – 18 April 2023

  • Bug fix release

1.0.12

Release Date – 17 April 2023

  • Multiple updates

1.0.11

Release Date – 1 March 2021

  • Updated copywrite notice

1.0.10

Release Date – 5 January 2021

  • Added 128×128 and 256×256 plugin icon

1.0.8

Release Date – 22 October 2020

  • Re-release 1.0.7 as stable version

1.0.7

Release Date – 22 October 2020

  • Bug fix for WordPress 4 style image captions
  • Support for new application domains

1.0.6

Release Date – 12 October 2020

  • Release to support WordPress version 5.5.1

1.0.5

Release Date – 7 September 2020

  • Fix minor bug where red cross isn’t visible in selected tags list

1.0.4

Release Date – 10 June 2020

  • Re-release due to mistake in version bump

1.0.3

Release Date – 10 June 2020

  • Fix minor bug where story cannot be pushed ot Ping!

1.0.2

Release Date – 09 June 2020

  • Turn on ability to add tags to news stories, this includes tags that already exist in the system or creation of new tags

1.0.1

Release Date – 09 June 2020

  • Ability to add tags to news stories, this includes tags that already exist in the system or creation of new tags= 0.1.7 =
    Release Date – 12 March 2020

  • Fix bug causing undefined variable error to show in plugin

0.1.6

Release Date – 12 March 2020

  • Fix fatal error when activating plugin
  • Fix bug causing undefined variable error to show in plugin
  • Fix bug where stories could not be pushed to Ping! system in WordPress 5.3
  • Provide feedback when user saves authorization token by showing ‘Saved!’

0.1.5

Release Date – 03 March 2020

  • Fix urls for communicating with Ping!

0.1.4

Release Date – 10 February 2020

  • Open Ping! link in new tab
  • Change button text to ‘Push again!’ after story pushed once
  • Add correct script tag for downloading Sentry via CDN
  • Hide display list titles when data not available
  • Add custom styling
  • Add nonces to ajax calls
  • Add Sentry error reporting
  • Changes to meet WordPress application standards

0.1.0

Release Date – 24 October 2019

  • Initial release of Ping! plugin
  • Ability to upload news story to the Ping! system
  • Ability to pick taxonomic classification for your news story
